mission_data.mission_description: Measures for Measures Part 2^Assist a science station in critical research to counter new Skaraan technology, and use some of your own.^Stock ship names required.^Recommended for experienced crews. ^Multi-ship, level selectable, GM Controls.^(v2.8.1 required for multi-ship play)

big_message.title: Measures for Measures Part 3
big_message.subtitle2: Version 1.0, for Artemis 2.8.1 by Neal Schlein

create.name: DS 64
create.hullKeys: Deep Space Base Command Base Base Base

create.name: Iptheth
create.raceKeys: Kralien Skaraan Torgoth standard support hasspecials

event.name: Mission Orders
event.incoming_comms_text: New Skaraan Technology Overview--^^Gravimetric Torpedos ^**Non-targetable^**Limited flight duration^**Can create localized tears in space-time upon detonation^**Deal direct shield and gravitational stress damage^**Reduce maximum shielding capacity upon impact^**Negate ship velocity upon impact^**Successive impacts may permanently reduce structural integrity^---COUNTER MEASURES: REPAIRS AVAILABLE AT STATIONS^^Warp Negation Technology^**Deployment previously observed on stations^**Based on Trithel Particles^**Overloads warp fields^**Generates excessive heat in Engineering^---COUNTER MEASURES: AUTO SHUT-OFF SYSTEM TO REDUCE WARP POWER TO 0^^Non-Magnetic Hull Materials^**Equipped ships do not trigger mines^---COUNTER MEASURES: NONE

To all ships in the Trithel System:^^You are ordered to proceed to SS Alamo II for upgrade, and then to assist the science station Schrodinger I in its research of Trithel particles.^^There is a significant enemy presence in the system; sensors are severely impacted by the nebula, but at least four stations have been detected. Find and eliminate all enemy threats.^^Recent events have proven that Skaraan forces have developed a dangerous new torpedo, and can negate warp fields. This is a major setback, and Command has authorized immediate deployment of prototype technologies.^^Due to the damage incurred during prior engagements, all vessels have been configured for automatic shutdown of warp systems to prevent total overload. If all on-board teams are disabled an emergency repair crew can be dispatched. Repairs for structural damage will be undertaken at stations as needed.^^Dock at SS Alamo II to select and have a prototype installed or removed. ^^Good luck.

warning_popup_message.message: Gravity stress repairs available at all stations

set_ship_text.name: Beau Cavalier
set_ship_text.hailtext: This is the Beau Cavalier. We'll go along with anything...for enough cash.

set_ship_text.name: Long Haul
set_ship_text.hailtext: Long Haul, here; this has been a major trip. Make it snappy--what do you want?

set_ship_text.name: Falcon
set_ship_text.hailtext: We are on defense duty. What do you need?

set_ship_text.name: Hawk
set_ship_text.hailtext: We are on defense duty. What do you need?

set_ship_text.name: Observer
set_ship_text.hailtext: This is the Observer; we're looking for our cat. Have you seen it?

event.name: All Enemy Stations Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: New intelligence indicates that the enemy has decided not to commit additional resources to the system. ^Good work.^^All you need to do is clean up what is already there!

event.name: Fled Bantha
event.incoming_comms_text: Enemy communications indicate that the freighter Bantha has escaped the sector with a load of Trithel particles. We cannot allow this to happen again!

event.name: Fled Llama
event.incoming_comms_text: Enemy communications indicate that the freighter Llama has escaped the sector with a load of Trithel particles. We cannot allow this to happen again!

event.name: Fled Dromedary
event.incoming_comms_text: Enemy communications indicate that the freighter Dromedary has escaped the sector with a load of Trithel particles. We cannot allow this to happen again!

event.name: Jump ship Retreat from map
event.incoming_comms_text: Exiting sector now.
event.warning_popup_message: This is Repair 1. Given the destruction of Schrodinger 1, I have received orders to retreat from this sector. Good luck...

event.name: Dock Jump ship
event.incoming_comms_text: Our jump ship has safely returned. Let us know if anyone else needs assistance.

event.name: Return Jump Complete
event.play_sound_now: Jump successful. Please direct us to the ship in need.

event.name: Schrodinger Destroyed Jump ship Retreat
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Repair 1. I have received orders to retreat from this sector due to the destruction of Schrodinger 1. Good luck...

event.name: Repair Complete

set_ship_text.name: Repair 1
set_ship_text.desc: Shuttle equiped with jump drive. Based at station Schrodinger 1.
set_ship_text.hailtext: This is Repair 1. I am heading back to the station.

event.incoming_comms_text: Transfer complete, I am heading back to the station.
event.warning_popup_message: Jump successful. Please direct us to the ship in need.

event.name: Repair Aborted
event.incoming_comms_text: I have been informed that the emergency repair team is no longer needed. Aborting mission.

event.incoming_comms_text: Aborting mission--I'm not flying to a completely destroyed ship!

event.name: Repair 1 Destroyed Station Exists
event.incoming_comms_text: May day, may day! We have been---- *signal lost*
The jump shuttle has been destroyed! It was our only way of sending you remote support. Sorry, but you're on your own.

event.name: Repair 1 Destroyed Station Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: May day, may day! We have been---- *signal lost*

event.name: Schrodinger 1 Destroyed CLEAR ALL summons
event.incoming_comms_text: May day, may day! The station has been---- *signal lost*

event.name: Repair 1 Rendezvous with repairTarget
event.warning_popup_message: Jump successful. Please direct us to the ship in need.

event.name: Repair 1 Jump
event.play_sound_now: Jump successful. Please direct us to the ship in need.
event.incoming_comms_text: Jump successful. Please direct us to the ship in need.

event.name: Repair 1 Prepare to Jump
event.incoming_comms_text: This Riener Knizia, test pilot for Repair 1.^^I have three repair techs on board and am charging the jump drive. We will be arriving in the vicinity of the distress call shortly.^^You'll have to guide us to your ship from there.^^Initiating jump in approximately 5 seconds...

event.name: Repair 1 Behavior and Description and Target

set_ship_text.name: Repair 1
set_ship_text.hailtext: This is Repair 1. We'll need directions.

event.name: Repair Request Recieved
event.incoming_comms_text: We recieved a request for emergency repair techs.^^A jump-drive equipped shuttle is being deployed, but we only have an approximate location of the emergency call due to distortion from the nebula.^^The shuttle will jump to the vicinity, and then you will have to guide it to your location.

warning_popup_message.message: Warning: All Mine Access Codes Changed

Alert: Breach Detected. Enemy Access Codes Cycling...

folder_arme.name: Ships Trigger Mines and increase sensors

event.name: Named Enemy Ships Trigger Mines and Scan Range
event.incoming_comms_text: Good work!^^We are getting precise telemetry on all enemy ships, and have patched it into our mine detonation systems.^^That new hull material is no longer an advantage for them!

set_ship_text.name: Y1
set_ship_text.desc: aisdble ncsa to nda Sgnlai eaconBs

set_ship_text.name: Y2
set_ship_text.desc: oT sidblea nasc all nda Sgnlai eaconBs

set_ship_text.name: Y3

set_ship_text.name: Y4
set_ship_text.desc: lla to diables ansc nda Sgnlai eaconBs

set_ship_text.name: Transfer Data
set_ship_text.desc: Scan to Submit Sensor Data (5 minutes)

event.name: Beam Impact Identified
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Dr. Trithel.^^We got it! The energy being put out in combat is causing de-ionization of the Trithel Particles and rendering them inert.^^You should be able to simulate the effect by raising power to your beams; that will allow you to use warp normally. I can't determine a precise value, but it'll have to be pretty high.^^This is going to finish off the PhDs for several of my students! Thank you!

event.name: Inert Particles Detected
event.incoming_comms_text: Keep sending us those sensor logs!^^We're really, really close to a break-through!

event.name: Inert Particles Detected
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Dr. Trithel.^Your sensor logs are very, very exciting. I have the entire research team in here going through them.^^Inert Trithel Particles are a new development; we've never observed them before. We are trying to pinpoint the source, but we think it was something you did.^^If we can figure it out, you'll be able to use Warp in a Trithel Zone!

event.name: Theory Confirmation 1
event.incoming_comms_text: You're sending us some good stuff, but we haven't seen anything that can help you directly yet. ^^Keep sending data back to us.

event.name: Theory Confirmation 1
event.incoming_comms_text: AUTOMATED MESSAGE^Thank you for sending us your sensor data. We are away from the lab at present; if there is anything useful someone will---^^Wait! This is Dr. Trithel; I happened to be in the lab when you sent your last batch of data; I believe you found proof of my theories.^^There are still big gaps in the analysis, but it appears the particles we've been studying are sourced from extreme gravity fluctuations.^^If you collect any more data, send it my way immediately. I will personally let you know if anything useful pops out.

event.name: No Updates
event.incoming_comms_text: AUTOMATED MESSAGE^Thank you for sending us your sensor data. We are away from the lab at present; if there is anything useful someone will contact you shortly.^^Have a nice day!

set_ship_text.name: Request Specs
set_ship_text.desc: Scan to send specs for all upgrades to Comms.

event.name: Send Specs to Comms
event.incoming_comms_text: New Skaraan Technology Overview--^^Gravimetric Torpedos ^**Reduce target's maximum shielding capacity^**Negate ship velocity upon impact^**May cause direct damage (reports vary)^**Can create localized tears in space-time^**Non-Targetable^**Limited duration^^Warp Negation Technology^**Based on Trithel Particles^**Overloads warp fields^**Deployment observed on stations^^Non-Magnetic Hull Materials^**Equipped ships do not trigger mines
Spec Sheet: Organic Circuitry^^--Damage repair systems regenerate naturally.^--1 random team will regenerate 1 member each minute.^--Full regeneration cycle takes 18 minutes+^

Spec Sheets: Angled Shields^^--Angle shields to front, rear, or evenly balanced^--Front focus: 150% forward / 50% rear^--Rear focus: 50% forward / 150% rear^--Balanced: 100% forward / 100% rear^^NOTE: Minor transfer loss will result in temporary reduction of overall shield strength. ^^Multple changes are not recommended during combat.

Spec Sheets: Sensor Decoys^^--Deploys two distortion beacons enhanced with basic weapons and thrusters^--Beacons may be directed as per normal allied ships^--Beacons will be destroyed upon taking any damage^--Beacon Power Duration: 2 minutes

Spec Sheet: Shield Buffer^^--Requires Shields to be raised for activation.^--Buffer cycles every 5 seconds.^--After deactivation, boosts shields by (1/20 of damage taken) x (total activated cycles).^--Upon deactivation, restores ship energy based upon number of activated cycles.^--Generates heat in all engineering subsystems (increases with length of activation)

Spec Sheets: False Transponder^^--Ship broadcasts enemy ID signal.^--Temporarily appears to be part of enemy fleet.^--Duration varies (appx. 8-15 seconds).^--Passive reset scans require 5 minutes.^--Can confuse drones and unguided missiles.^^NOTE: Allied ships and stations will react according to perceived ID signal.
Spec Sheet: Bio Weapon (Pods)^^--Rear-deploys a fake wreck loaded with 3 piranhas.^--5 pods installed; additional stores upon redock^--Requires proximity triggering by a TSN ship.^
Spec Sheet: Coolant Upgrade^^--+2 total Engineering Coolant^--Immediate and permanent addition

Spec Sheet: Mine Bypass^^--Temporarily demagnetizes hull (appx. 15 seconds)^--Ship will not trigger mines while demagnetized.^--Requires recharge after use, appx. 3 minutes^^Note: Mines can still be exploded by other nearby ships.
Spec Sheet: Shield Boost^^--20% boost to maximum front shields^--20% boost to maximum rear shields^--Immediate increase, based upon current maximum strength.

Prototype Overview^^--Shield Boost (20% increase to each shield.)^^--Coolant Upgrade (+2 Engineering Coolant.)^^--Mine Bypass (Temporarily allows ship to fly near mines.)^^--Bio Weapon (Deploys a wreck with piranhas. Requires triggering.)^^--False Transponder (Broadcasts enemy ID signal.)^^--Shield Buffer (Stores energy from shields for power and shield recharge. Generates heat.)^^--Sensor Decoys (Deploy commandable sensor decoys for 2 minutes.)^^--Shield Angling (Focus shields to front, back, or balanced.)^^--Organic Circuitry (Regenerating Damcon teams.)

folder_arme.name: Per Ship Upgrade Offer Trigger and Dock Failure

event.name: One-Ship Upgrade Choice 2
event.incoming_comms_text: The Mine Bypass upgrade has been taken.

event.name: One-Ship Upgrade Choice 6
event.incoming_comms_text: The Shield Buffer has been taken and is being installed.

event.name: One-Ship Upgrade Choice 7
event.incoming_comms_text: The Sensor Decoy system has been taken and is being installed.

event.name: One-Ship Upgrade Choice 8
event.incoming_comms_text: The Angled Shields module has been taken and is being installed.

event.name: One-Ship Upgrade Choice 9
event.incoming_comms_text: The Organic Circuitry is being installed on a ship.

event.name: Multi-Ship Upgrade Choice 1
event.incoming_comms_text: A shield booster is being installed, but we have more of them.

event.name: Multi-Ship Upgrade Choice 3
event.incoming_comms_text: We are installing an Extra Coolant module, but have more of them.

event.name: One-Ship Upgrade Choice 4
event.incoming_comms_text: The Bio Pods are being installed on a ship. Glad to have them out of the cargo bay!

event.name: One-Ship Upgrade Choice 5
event.incoming_comms_text: The spoofed transponder is being installed on a ship. Can't wait to see how you use it!!

event.name: Passcodes recovered
event.incoming_comms_text: We just learned that a secure case with the prototype's removal passcodes survived the explosion and has now been recovered!^^The technicians can begin swapping out upgrades again.

event.name: Disable Explanation Station Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: Alert to all ships!^^The remaining prototypes and underlying research was all lost with the destruction of Station Alamo II!^^The lone surviving technician says that any attempt to remove your current prototypes without the proper passcodes will result in a total system meltdown.^^Hopefully you have what you need!

event.name: Disable Explanation to Comms
event.incoming_comms_text: Alert to all ships!^^The prototype design team has been killed in an explosion!^^We don't know whether this was an enemy attack or a seriously unfortunate accident, but it's bad either way.^^The surviving technicians have informed us that they can no longer remove your installed prototypes or exchange them. Secret passcodes are needed to prevent total system meltdown, and only the lead developers had them.^^Everyone is pretty shaken, but the techs say they can still install something on any ship without an existing prototype.^

Enemy Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: Good work!^Now that we can counter the Skaraan's new technology, we can keep them at bay.^^You've done a great service this day.
